text.autoconfig.indypets.option.selectiv: If true, follow mode is handled per pet (via sneak-interact),
otherwise pets are independent except when disabled below
text.autoconfig.indypets.option.silentMo: There is no other indicator whether a pet is following you.
text.autoconfig.indypets.option.independ: Only applies when Selective Following is disabled
Only applies when Selective Following is disabled
Only applies when Selective Following is disabled
